channel.title: Where to Find Help :: K-State CIS 400 Textbook
channel.description: Web Only This textbook was authored for the CIS 400 - Object-Oriented Design, Implementation, and Testing course at Kansas State University. This front matter is specific to that course. If you are not enrolled in the course, please disregard this section. As you work on the materials in this course, you may run into questions or problems and need assistance. Course Sessions As mentioned before, the course sessions are one of the best time to get help with your assignments - during this time the instructor and TAs are scheduled to be available and on-hand in the computer lab.
